trans-unit.source: Represents the pager row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa a linha de pager em um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the FormViewPagerRow is created to hold the pager controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do FormViewPagerRow é criada para conter os controles de pager em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> interface is a marker that indicates that the FormViewPagerRow control is part of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object's control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>interface é um marcador que indica se o controle FormViewPagerRow faz parte do <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>hierarquia de controle do objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer>

trans-unit.source: This class is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é usada principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle.

trans-unit.source: Control developers can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CreateRow%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InitializePager%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> class to create a custom pager row.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores de controle podem substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A>construtor e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CreateRow%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InitializePager%2A>métodos do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>classe para criar uma linha de pager personalizado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InitializePager%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CreateRow%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The FormViewPagerRow constructor calls the base class constructor, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.%23ctor%2A>, with the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: O construtor FormViewPagerRow chama o construtor de classe base, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.%23ctor%2A>, com os parâmetros especificados.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow> control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control, the call is made `rowType` equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> and `rowState` equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>.
trans-unit.target: Para um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow>controlar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>controle, a chamada é feita `rowType` igual a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>e `rowState` igual a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPagerRow>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O índice da linha de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> controle.
